name: MoleculeNet
description: A benchmark dataset platform designed to evaluate and compare machine learning models for molecular properties.

name: DeepChem
description: An open-source Python library that simplifies the use of deep learning in drug discovery, materials science, and quantum chemistry.

name: Chemprop
description: A powerful neural network-based tool for molecular property prediction, used for QSAR and virtual screening.

name: IBM RXN for Chemistry
description: A cloud-based AI platform for forward and retrosynthesis prediction, reaction planning, and molecule design.

name: AutoQSAR
description: Automates QSAR model building using machine learning, with robust validation and model interpretation tools.

name: ChemTS
description: A deep reinforcement learning framework for automatic molecular generation targeting specific chemical properties.

name: MolGAN
description: A generative adversarial network (GAN) for generating small molecules with graph structures.

name: ChemicalX
description: A deep learning library tailored for drug-drug interaction prediction, compatible with PyTorch.

name: AIZynthFinder
description: An open-source tool for retrosynthetic route planning using Monte Carlo tree search and neural networks.

name: ChemSpace
description: A massive compound database and AI-based virtual screening tool for hit discovery and lead optimization.
